statements: SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms
SELECT patient_name, date_signed FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE form_id = 1
SELECT form_id, patient_name, date_signed FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE date_signed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY form_id DESC
SELECT patient_name, consent_details FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE blockchain_hash IS NULL
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE form_id = 100
SELECT patient_name, consent_details FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE date_signed > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY date_signed DESC
SELECT form_id, patient_name, date_signed FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_details IS NOT NULL
SELECT form_id, patient_name, blockchain_hash FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, consent_form_hash FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY record_id;
SELECT patient_id, transaction_id FROM blockchain_records WHERE transaction_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM patient_consent_forms JOIN blockchain_records ON patient_consent_forms.patient_id = blockchain_records.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM blockchain_records WHERE transaction_id = 'abc-123');
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY consent_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consents ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT consent_id, consent_text FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_consents;
SELECT consent_id, patient_id FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pc.consent_id, p.patient_name, pc.consent_date FROM patient_consents pc JOIN patients p ON pc.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pc.consent_id, b.block_hash, b.block_timestamp FROM patient_consents pc JOIN blockchain_records b ON pc.consent_id = b.consent_id WHERE b.block_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms ORDER BY consent_date DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_status FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_status = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, from_node, to_node FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_data FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, consent_date FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT node_id, node_address FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_status = TRUE;
SELECT record_id, record_data FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_date < '2022-01-01');
SELECT transaction_id, from_node, to_node, transaction_data FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_node <> to_node;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM blockchain_network ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, consent_text, consent_date FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, network_id FROM records WHERE patient_id = '1a24e5b6-1b70-4c1f-9ce3-8410dd398edd';
SELECT * FROM patient_consents WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, consent_text FROM patient_consents WHERE consent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT record_id, record_data, record_date FROM records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, audit_trail.action, audit_trail.action_date FROM users JOIN audit_trail ON users.user_id = audit_trail.record_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_name LIKE '%health%';
